properties.areaDesc: Southeast Warren; Northern Warren; Western Windham; Southern Herkimer; Hamilton; Montgomery; Northern Fulton; Northern Saratoga; Bennington; Southern Fulton; Northern Herkimer; Southern Washington; Northern Washington
properties.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 5 at 4:18PM EST until February 8 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Albany NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...Wintry mix precipitation is expected during the Winter
Weather Advisory period. Total snow and sleet accumulations are
expected to range between 3 and 5 inches with ice accumulations
from freezing rain between one and two tenths of an inch. Heavy
wintry mix precipitation is expected during the Winter Storm
Watch period. Total snow and some sleet accumulations of 5 to 10
inches with ice accumulations from freezing rain less than one
tenth of an inch possible.

* WHERE...The southern Adirondacks, the Mohawk Valley, Lake George
Saratoga region and Upper Hudson Valley in eastern New York and
the Bennington area and Green Mountains in southern Vermont.

* WHEN...The Winter Weather Advisory is in effect from 1 AM
tonight to 10 PM EST Thursday. The Winter Storm Watch is in
effect from late Thursday night through late Friday night.

* IMPACTS...Power outages and tree damage are possible due to the
ice. The hazardous travel conditions will likely impact the
Thursday morning commute as well as the morning and evening
commute on Friday.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Allow extra travel time and drive
cautiously..
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 10 PM EST THURSDAY... ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE THURSDAY NIGHT THROUGH LATE FRIDAY NIGHT
